Detailed Description

This child class of VectorGenerator is used to generate 3D vectors at a fixed point.

PointVectorGenerator * PointVectorGenerator::parsePythonTuple ( PyObject *  args  )  [static]

This method parses a Python tuple and builds a PointVectorGenerator.

The arguments accepted are a single triple of numbers. Args is not a borrowed object so it needs to have its reference count decremented after use.

Parameters:
args Python tuple containing initialisation information.
Returns:
A pointer to the newly created vector generator if successful; NULL, otherwise.
